page.title: 19OUR HOUSES
page.content: {KEVIN'S HOUSE}My house is a semi on the council estate.It has 3 bedrooms,a sitting-room,a kitchen,a bathroom and 2 toilets.It has a flower garden,a vegetable garden and a lawn.Outside is a wash-house and a coal house. {DIANE'S HOUSE}My house is on a private estate and it is big.It has 4 bedrooms and a playroom,a bathroom,a sitting room,a kitchen,a laundry and a dining room.My back garden is also very big. {NICOLA'S HOUSE}My house is a bungalow.It has 6 rooms.There are 2 bedrooms,a bathroom, a toilet,a sitting-room and a kitchen.In a bungalow you do not have an upstairs.
